alert.note: Alert for Butler; Hamilton; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:10AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF UNION COUNTY IN INDIANA, AND PORTIONS OF HAMILTON, BUTLER, AND PREBLE COUNTIES IN OHIO THROUGH 545 AM EDT... At 509 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Liberty to Mack, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Hamilton, Middletown, Fairfield, Oxford, Norwood, Forest Park, Sharonville, Monroe, Blue Ash, Trenton, Springdale, Reading, Montgomery, Harrison, North College Hill, Madeira, Wyoming, Eaton and Cheviot. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 4 and 17. I-74 in Ohio between mile markers 2 and 19. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 3 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
